4314410.name: Omi Oh My AI Soundtrack
4314410.description:
What happens when a charmingly quirky AI made in the 90's helps you build a puzzle game? You get Omi Oh My AI!

Embark on a captchavating (musical) adventure with the music of Omi Oh My AI. Featuring songs inspired by the 90's and 2000's with digital notes and electronic sounds telling the story of the friendly AI that was forgotten for a decade.

A Musical Journey

Omi Oh My AI's soundtrack features songs from across a wide variety of genres from chillhop to acoustic, and chiptune. Each song tells a story about a point in history or a feeling experienced by Omi. You might even find a few hidden secrets among the sounds to bring into your game experience.

A Game About AI, Made By Humans

Omi wouldn't exist without the talented humans that helped to make them a reality. Every song was created by talented humans to tell a story about an AI with remarkably human faults.

Developed with support from Screenwest in Western Australia on Whadjuk Noongar Boodjar.
